title: McDonald's Names New Finance, Supply-Chain Executives; Fast-food company's moves come amid changes to its franchising system
text:
McDonald's said Ian Borden will succeed Mr. Ozan as chief financial officer, and Marion Gross will take on the top supply-chain post.

The moves are effective Sept. 1.

Last week, the company said it is planning to make some of the biggest changes in decades to the franchising system that underpins its U.S. operations, as it seeks to reinvigorate its base of restaurant owners, according to an email to franchisees viewed by The Wall Street Journal.

Write to Colin Kellaher at colin.kellaher@wsj.com

McDonald's Names New Finance, Supply-Chain Executives
